titles.title: Spectrum Resource Assurance Act

To permit wireless carriers to obtain sufficient spectrum to meet the growing demand for existing services and ensure that such carriers have the spectrum they need to deploy fixed and advanced services, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Telecommunications and the Internet.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

bill.summary: 7/17/2001--Introduced. Spectrum Resource Assurance Act - Prohibits the Federal Communications Commission from imposing any limit on spectrum aggregation for licenses for commercial mobile radio services. Terminates any current limitation.
